mapper.select: WITH FILES AS ( SELECT COMMUNITY_ID AS ADDITIONS_COMMUNITY_ID, LISTAGG(FILE_SRC, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY UPLOAD_AT) AS FILES FROM SHORTFORM_COMMUNITY_ADDITIONS GROUP BY COMMUNITY_ID ) SELECT c.ID, u.USERNAME, u.PROFILE_IMG_SRC, u.MENTION, c.COMMUNITY_UUID, c.COMMUNITY_WRITER_ID, c.COMMUNITY_TEXT, -- CLOB 그대로 출력 가능 c.CREATE_AT, f.FILES FROM SHORTFORM_COMMUNITYS c LEFT JOIN FILES f ON c.ID = f.ADDITIONS_COMMUNITY_ID INNER JOIN SHORTFORM_USERS u ON u.ID = c.COMMUNITY_WRITER_ID WHERE c.COMMUNITY_WRITER_ID = #{id} ORDER BY c.CREATE_AT DESC

WITH FILES AS ( SELECT COMMUNITY_ID AS ADDITIONS_COMMUNITY_ID, LISTAGG(FILE_SRC, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY UPLOAD_AT) AS FILES FROM SHORTFORM_COMMUNITY_ADDITIONS GROUP BY COMMUNITY_ID ) SELECT c.ID, c.COMMUNITY_UUID, c.COMMUNITY_WRITER_ID, c.COMMUNITY_TEXT, -- CLOB 그대로 출력 가능 f.FILES, u.USERNAME, u.MAIL, u.PROFILE_IMG_SRC, u.MENTION, c.CREATE_AT FROM SHORTFORM_COMMUNITYS c LEFT JOIN FILES f ON c.ID = f.ADDITIONS_COMMUNITY_ID INNER JOIN SHORTFORM_USERS u ON u.ID = c.COMMUNITY_WRITER_ID WHERE c.COMMUNITY_UUID = #{uuid} ORDER BY c.CREATE_AT DESC
